review_blob: Bottle 500ml. Cloudy orange-copper color, and head is almost missing. Aroma is grapefruit, pine and grass, but not very impressive. Grapefruit, maltiness with good bitterness flavor. Overall quite solid.

500 ml bottle. Dark brown with beautiful white head. Aroma is malty with dried fruits and a bit of chocolate and alcohol. Flavor is just stunning - malty, hoppy with great taste of dried fruits (like plums, apples). No sign of intrusive alcohol. Impressive!
Bottle. Pretty cloudy orange with white head. Sour fruits, tart, horseblanket and little malty aroma. Tart, dry, citrus flavor.
